leve.name: Dandelion Don't Tell No Lies
leve.description: In one of the Temple Knight libraries, I came across a curious letter from one hundred summers past. A medic was traveling with a squadron of knights which was driven into the arms of the enemy and forced to fend for themselves for a fortnight. Hungry and fatigued, they consumed a withered plant for sustenance and saw their muscles bulge in a matter of moments. With their enhanced physical state, it was said they cleaved their way out, a single stroke of the strongarm beheading three or four dragons! The sketch in the letter bears a striking resemblance to the heirloom dandelion which thrives in the dragons' lair, and I suspect it is the selfsame miracle shrub. Pluck them for me so I may experiment with petal extractions.
leve.client: Temple Knights Hospitalier Captain Abel Whitecape
